<hr>


**Abstract** DNA assembly is low throughput and unreliable. Implementation of Software platforms developed to automate the design of DNA assemblies are error-prone since they are performed by hand. Here, we present an open-source python package to integrate DNA assembly software outputs with the OT-2 open-source liquid handling robot. This package reduces the time, training, costs, and wastes associated with molecular biology workflows. We demonstrate the versatility of our software by demonstrating several scarless, multipart DNA assemblies.
